events.message: We have received the application for the software engineer position from the candidate. The resume indicates strong skills in backend development and cloud infrastructure.
The candidate's application has been categorized under Engineering based on keywords related to software engineer and devops experience detailed in the CV.
Recruiter John Smith has been assigned to manage the case for this software engineer candidate to proceed with scheduling interviews and further evaluation.
Initial screening call completed successfully. The candidate answered technical questions confidently, showing good knowledge of cloud technologies and backend frameworks.
The candidate responded promptly to the interview scheduling email and confirmed availability for the technical interview next week without any issues.
Technical interview with the engineering panel has been scheduled for 2024-05-08 at 10 AM, focusing on backend development and DevOps scenarios.
